The worlds biggest brewer is pulling out of Russia, exiting a key beer market, as Moscows invasion of Ukraine drags on and multinational companies weigh up their options.

articles.author: Jon Swartz
articles.title: Snap's stock rises despite revenue shortfall amid 'a challenging operating environment' - MarketWatch
articles.description: Snap Inc.'s stock gained in volatile after-hours trading Thursday despite quarterly revenue that didn't meet Wall Street estimates.
articles.content: Snap Inc.s stock gained in volatile after-hours trading Thursday despite quarterly revenue that didnt meet Wall Street estimates.The company reported a first-quarter net loss of $359.6 million, or 22… [+3153 chars]
